item.title: CVE-2024-38709|2024-08-02T04:19:20.242Z -- milan%20petrovic -- gd%20rating%20system
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Milan Petrovic GD Rating System allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects GD Rating System: from n/a through 3.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-25093|2024-06-04T17:35:43.862Z -- milan%20petrovic -- gd%20rating%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Milan Petrovic GD Rating System allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GD Rating System: from n/a through 3.5.
